title: The Silent AIR COOLED Gaming PC!
tags: how to build a gaming pc
description: Our search for the quietest gaming PC is going into air cooling territory!  But does an air cooler provide enough cooling for an overclocked 9900K?  Remember this CPU was a challenge for our water cooled system. Follow our quest to build a silent gaming pc.  Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  Silent Base 601 Black:   Silent Base 601 Orange:   Noctua NH-D15:   Noctua NF-A12:   Lian Li Strimer:    ASRock Z390 Taichi:   Intel 9900K:    Cooler Master ML360RGB:     Subscribe    Review unit provided free of charge by BeQuiet. This video is sponsored by Cooler Master. As per HWC guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer.   As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (from Amazon):  Panasonic GH5 -  Panasonic GH4 -  Panasonic G7 -  Canon C100 -  Sony RX100m3 -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #silentgaming #gamingpc #hardwarecanucks
